title: Game stopping and no "reconnect" option
body:
Oy,

My game "disappeared", I was playing a game for about 20 mins, and then the game stopped, the --Attempting to reconnect-- bar showed up just like if I was lagging hard. I waited a little but I ended up alt+F4 in order to try to reconnect faster from the laucher.
Back to the launcher, there was no such option, I was on the home menu just as if my game never existed, and I was even able to start a new game (what I did), but, fuck it, I was winning this ranked, and I don't know if my mates were kicked as well or if I will have 9 reports for leaving a game.
Get me back me 20 LP and fix the game please :3

replies.body:
Hey there,

To stop future disconnections with League, please ensure that your DNS is using Riots preferred DNS. This will ensure all your connections with Riot will go smoothly.

Step 1. First of all, in your windows PC go to the Control Panel and select Network and sharing center.

Step 2. And there click on Change adapter settings.

Step 3. Now there you will see all networks, select the network that you want to configure for Google DNS.

If you have decided to try out Google’s DNS and want to change ethernet settings then simply right-click on Local Area Connection and then select Properties.

Step 4. Now click on Networking tab and there under This connection uses the following items select the option Internet Protocol Version 4 (TCP/IPv4) and then click on properties.

Step 5. Now choose the radio button Use the following DNS server addresses there and there will be written some default IP, simply clear them. Now there fill the value of google DNS value that is 8.8.8.8 OR 8.8.4.4 and then simply click on “OK” and then restart your network/computer.

Hope this helped :D. Also, the feels for your rank game :( .

Thanks
Swhyper
